title: Eagleso
author: Eagleso
content: Hello, I've been with crypto for 5 years, and I mine ethereum, but now after September 15, ethereum production will stop, which coin do you think will have the best profit, some say ETC, some say RVN, but etc block 4GB graphics cards, as well as RVN, I will block 4GB very soon, as well as ERGO, only BEAM seems to accept them all, I searched on twitter and saw several posts like this one that explains it in a short time, and I wanted to ask your opinion, do you think he is right, it seems to me that yes, you will accept everything.is the future #beam?Thank you.

comments.author: 5W-KILO
comments.created_time: August 27, 2022, 09:27:50 AMLast edit: August 27, 2022, 10:27:06 AM by 5W-KILO
comments.body: No coin owns the future, many projects will fail before another bull season gets here so do not use all your money to invest in one project, this is one of the reasons why diversification is the best investment strategy, even if you have to mine this BEAM make sure its not the only one, anything is possible.

comments.author: Eagleso
comments.body: I understand you very well and you are completely right that many projects will fail in the future, but this BEAM, I look at ethermine, it is on the official site of the ethereum pool, and vitalikbuterin himself said that you can also mine beam, I visited the site I downloaded their app and it is very interesting in transactions, the information cannot be seen publicly, there is a privacy project, as well as the halving of beam will be done after 5 years from 2019, which I believe will be a good project, just my rig when ethereum stops, it will produce beam, for that and I asked you what you know.thank you

comments.author: ANSEL_2.0
comments.body: Beam is not bad brother, the thing is if Beam mining is profitable to mine then keep mining but if other coins are more profitable for example ETC or Ergo its wiser to mine one of these and swap them for Beam since you like Beam more.

comments.author: Eagleso
comments.body: Quote from: ANSEL_2.0 on August 27, 2022, 11:08:21 AMBeam is not bad brother, the thing is if Beam mining is profitable to mine then keep mining but if other coins are more profitable for example ETC or Ergo its wiser to mine one of these and swap them for Beam since you like Beam more. I am streaming all of them: ETC, BEAM, RVN, ERGOI'm following the hash rate of the network, and this beam alone added more than 60 mines, and the price starts to turn green, and you say to mine ETC & ERGOetc has stopped 4gb has passed the dag file, so will ERGO 4gb and 6gb I will stop it soon, if we put 4gb in RVN we can't do mining because the cards are old and can't be mined properly, that's what I'm thinking that will all be included in BEAM.

comments.author: reaplatform
comments.body: Quote from: Eagleso on August 27, 2022, 11:36:52 AMQuote from: ANSEL_2.0 on August 27, 2022, 11:08:21 AMBeam is not bad brother, the thing is if Beam mining is profitable to mine then keep mining but if other coins are more profitable for example ETC or Ergo its wiser to mine one of these and swap them for Beam since you like Beam more. I am streaming all of them: ETC, BEAM, RVN, ERGOI'm following the hash rate of the network, and this beam alone added more than 60 mines, and the price starts to turn green, and you say to mine ETC & ERGOetc has stopped 4gb has passed the dag file, so will ERGO 4gb and 6gb I will stop it soon, if we put 4gb in RVN we can't do mining because the cards are old and can't be mined properly, that's what I'm thinking that will all be included in BEAM.You have a very good opinion, with this opinion I think that maybe the day will come, oh if I had a beam

comments.body: Quote from: reaplatform on August 27, 2022, 12:24:20 PMQuote from: Eagleso on August 27, 2022, 11:36:52 AMQuote from: ANSEL_2.0 on August 27, 2022, 11:08:21 AMBeam is not bad brother, the thing is if Beam mining is profitable to mine then keep mining but if other coins are more profitable for example ETC or Ergo its wiser to mine one of these and swap them for Beam since you like Beam more. comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Miners mine approximately 57600 coins per day. At 18 cents, that's $10,400 per day. Even if the price increased by 5 times, it would be 12 times less than the profit from Ethereum Classic. I don't see the future of mining in this coin.

comments.author: Eagleso
comments.body: Quote from: FP91G on August 27, 2022, 12:59:20 PMMiners mine approximately 57600 coins per day. At 18 cents, that's $10,400 per day. Even if the price increased by 5 times, it would be 12 times less than the profit from Ethereum Classic. I don't see the future of mining in this coin.Well done if you do mining and save some amount, that's how it was with ERGO and Ethereum Classic, and that's how it was with bitcoin and ethereum, but now the amount has reached production and now you can't have any amount, we have to think in terms of long, because the potential in BEAM is the same as that of ethereum if we calculate it on marketcapof.com, it also had the privacy that the transaction or the money you have cannot be sold, the essence and the future of this coin is a very good one example I take:a whale is discovered and if he wants to, you can put his money in the beam and that job is over,also in Beam's roadmap, it appears that the halving will happen from 2019, which was created in the next 5 years, in the 6th year and in the 7th year I will do halving and this time will come, like Ethereum, which will release 0.01 Beam for all mines.l.also had NFT GALLERY & DOMAIN NAME .beam and had a very hardworking team.Do not forget my words now beam is only 0.18$, I think it will explode very soon,

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Eagleso on August 27, 2022, 07:47:44 PMDon't pay pizza with beam.Where can I buy pizza? I want to be in history

comments.author: S3300
comments.body: Quote from: Eagleso on August 27, 2022, 01:16:55 AMHello, I've been with crypto for 5 years, and I mine ethereum, but now after September 15, ethereum production will stop, which coin do you think will have the best profit, some say ETC, some say RVN, but etc block 4GB graphics cards, as well as RVN, I will block 4GB very soon, as well as ERGO, only BEAM seems to accept them all, I searched on twitter and saw several posts like this one that explains it in a short time, and I wanted to ask your opinion, do you think he is right, it seems to me that yes, you will accept everything.is the future #beam?Thank you.You will have no problem mining SuperSero (ProgPow) and Firo on a 4GB like rx580 4GB and it's still profitable too, very soon ETC will be the perfect spot for etherum hashrates so these are the best right now.

comments.author: arielbit
comments.body: beam or (insert coin name here) is not the future.100x is the future  or even better 1000x

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: I have a hard time thinking Beam could be the future.  It has some cool tech, but it seems like it was launched in a way that left it dead from the start.  It's cousin Grin seemed like it was launching more fairly and with more support throughout the community.  I am surprised it didn't do better, but I think it suffered from issues with being so much different that many people found it complicating.  I loved using it, and hope that sort of tech makes it into Bitcoin someday.

comments.author: VRExpress
comments.body: Beam have shown the world what it can do, the chart shows that the project is getting weaker, the best cojns ot projects that you can say its the future are those that are work in progress, they can easily grow over 200x, avoid Beam and find these gems.

comments.author: Eagleso
comments.body: Quote from: VRExpress on August 29, 2022, 08:37:49 AMBeam have shown the world what it can do, the chart shows that the project is getting weaker, the best cojns ot projects that you can say its the future are those that are work in progress, they can easily grow over 200x, avoid Beam and find these gems.I think that the future is bright because I have been searching for it for many days.

comments.author: BitKongy
comments.body: Quote from: arielbit on August 29, 2022, 06:25:47 AMbeam or (insert coin name here) is not the future.100x is the future  or even better 1000x  100x gems are always something new, something people won't see coming, it's why new projects have the higher chance of bringing 100x gains to investors but also higher risk of losing money too.

comments.author: Eagleso
comments.body: Quote from: BitKongy on September 02, 2022, 08:18:23 AMQuote from: arielbit on August 29, 2022, 06:25:47 AMbeam or (insert coin name here) is not the future.100x is the future  or even better 1000x  100x gems are always something new, something people won't see coming, it's why new projects have the higher chance of bringing 100x gains to investors but also higher risk of losing money too. I understand you, but you don't understand that you will burn like in LUNA, #beam is new ethereum algorithm is the same as ethereum.
